title: What font is used in this Clorox headline??
content:
What font is used in this Clorox headline??

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cdw\_decor\_h1.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150223075822/http:/typophile.com/files/cdw_decor_h1_0.gif) | 3.44 KB |
author: leojkosir

comments.content:
On further review, the C in your sample is not as closed as those in Trade Gothic or News Gothic. Also yours looks a bit wider. So perhaps a customized Trade Gothic, or something that resembles it.

Sorry, I guess that's not too helpful.

- Mike Yanega
Frutiger 45 Light seems pretty close to me.

This is Whitney Light from H&FJ.

[http://typography.com/fonts/font\_styles.php?productLineID=100026](http://web.archive.org/web/20150223075822/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100026 "http://typography.com/fonts/font\_styles.php?productLineID=100026")
